Bible.Verse: 24 And after that Hezron was dead in Calebephratah, then Abiah Hezron's wife bare him Ashur the father of Tekoa.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 25 And the sons of Jerahmeel the firstborn of Hezron were, Ram the firstborn, and Bunah, and Oren, and Ozem, and Ahijah.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 26 Jerahmeel had also another wife, whose name was Atarah; she was the mother of Onam.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 27 And the sons of Ram the firstborn of Jerahmeel were, Maaz, and Jamin, and Eker.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 28 And the sons of Onam were, Shammai, and Jada. And the sons of Shammai; Nadab, and Abishur.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 29 And the name of the wife of Abishur was Abihail, and she bare him Ahban, and Molid.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 30 And the sons of Nadab; Seled, and Appaim: but Seled died without children.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 31 And the sons of Appaim; Ishi. And the sons of Ishi; Sheshan. And the children of Sheshan; Ahlai.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 32 And the sons of Jada the brother of Shammai; Jether, and Jonathan: and Jether died without children.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 33 And the sons of Jonathan; Peleth, and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 34 Now Sheshan had no sons, but daughters. And Sheshan had a servant, an Egyptian, whose name was Jarha.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 35 And Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha his servant to wife; and she bare him Attai.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 36 And Attai begat Nathan, and Nathan begat Zabad,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 37 And Zabad begat Ephlal, and Ephlal begat Obed,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 38 And Obed begat Jehu, and Jehu begat Azariah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 39 And Azariah begat Helez, and Helez begat Eleasah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 40 And Eleasah begat Sisamai, and Sisamai begat Shallum,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 41 And Shallum begat Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begat Elishama.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 42 Now the sons of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel were, Mesha his firstborn, which was the father of Ziph; and the sons of Mareshah the father of Hebron.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 43 And the sons of Hebron; Korah, and Tappuah, and Rekem, and Shema.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 44 And Shema begat Raham, the father of Jorkoam: and Rekem begat Shammai.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 45 And the son of Shammai was Maon: and Maon was the father of Bethzur.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 46 And Ephah, Caleb's concubine, bare Haran, and Moza, and Gazez: and Haran begat Gazez.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 47 And the sons of Jahdai; Regem, and Jotham, and Gesham, and Pelet, and Ephah, and Shaaph.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 48 Maachah, Caleb's concubine, bare Sheber, and Tirhanah.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 49 She bare also Shaaph the father of Madmannah, Sheva the father of Machbenah, and the father of Gibea: and the daughter of Caleb was Achsa.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 50 These were the sons of Caleb the son of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah; Shobal the father of Kirjathjearim,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 51 Salma the father of Bethlehem, Hareph the father of Bethgader.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 52 And Shobal the father of Kirjathjearim had sons; Haroeh, and half of the Manahethites.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 53 And the families of Kirjathjearim; the Ithrites, and the Puhites, and the Shumathites, and the Mishraites; of them came the Zareathites, and the Eshtaulites.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 54 The sons of Salma; Bethlehem, and the Netophathites, Ataroth, the house of Joab, and half of the Manahethites, the Zorites.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 2:
Bible.Verse: 55 And the families of the scribes which dwelt at Jabez; the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, and Suchathites. These are the Kenites that came of Hemath, the father of the house of Rechab.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 1 Now these were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron; the firstborn Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 2 The third, Absalom the son of Maachah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur: the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 3 The fifth, Shephatiah of Abital: the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 4 These six were born unto him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 5 And these were born unto him in Jerusalem; Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bathshua the daughter of Ammiel:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 6 Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 7 And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 8 And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 9 These were all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 10 And Solomon's son was Rehoboam, Abia his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 11 Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 12 Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 13 Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 14 Amon his son, Josiah his son.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 15 And the sons of Josiah were, the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 16 And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 17 And the sons of Jeconiah; Assir, Salathiel his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 18 Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 19 And the sons of Pedaiah were, Zerubbabel, and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel; Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 20 And Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushabhesed, five.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 21 And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 22 And the sons of Shechaniah; Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah; Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 23 And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 3:
Bible.Verse: 24 And the sons of Elioenai were, Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Dalaiah, and Anani, seven.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 1 The sons of Judah; Pharez, Hezron, and Carmi, and Hur, and Shobal.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 2 And Reaiah the son of Shobal begat Jahath; and Jahath begat Ahumai, and Lahad. These are the families of the Zorathites.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 3 And these were of the father of Etam; Jezreel, and Ishma, and Idbash: and the name of their sister was Hazelelponi:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 4 And Penuel the father of Gedor, and Ezer the father of Hushah. These are the sons of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah, the father of Bethlehem.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 5 And Ashur the father of Tekoa had two wives, Helah and Naarah.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 6 And Naarah bare him Ahuzam, and Hepher, and Temeni, and Haahashtari. These were the sons of Naarah.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 7 And the sons of Helah were, Zereth, and Jezoar, and Ethnan.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 8 And Coz begat Anub, and Zobebah, and the families of Aharhel the son of Harum.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 9 And Jabez was more honourable than his brethren: and his mother called his name Jabez, saying, Because I bare him with sorrow.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 10 And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, Oh that thou wouldest bless me indeed, and enlarge my coast, and that thine hand might be with me, and that thou wouldest keep me from evil, that it may not grieve me! And God granted him that which he requested.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 11 And Chelub the brother of Shuah begat Mehir, which was the father of Eshton.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 12 And Eshton begat Bethrapha, and Paseah, and Tehinnah the father of Irnahash. These are the men of Rechah.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 13 And the sons of Kenaz; Othniel, and Seraiah: and the sons of Othniel; Hathath.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 14 And Meonothai begat Ophrah: and Seraiah begat Joab, the father of the valley of Charashim; for they were craftsmen.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 15 And the sons of Caleb the son of Jephunneh; Iru, Elah, and Naam: and the sons of Elah, even Kenaz.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 16 And the sons of Jehaleleel; Ziph, and Ziphah, Tiria, and Asareel.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 17 And the sons of Ezra were, Jether, and Mered, and Epher, and Jalon: and she bare Miriam, and Shammai, and Ishbah the father of Eshtemoa.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 18 And his wife Jehudijah bare Jered the father of Gedor, and Heber the father of Socho, and Jekuthiel the father of Zanoah. And these are the sons of Bithiah the daughter of Pharaoh, which Mered took.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 19 And the sons of his wife Hodiah the sister of Naham, the father of Keilah the Garmite, and Eshtemoa the Maachathite.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 20 And the sons of Shimon were, Amnon, and Rinnah, Benhanan, and Tilon. And the sons of Ishi were, Zoheth, and Benzoheth.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 21 The sons of Shelah the son of Judah were, Er the father of Lecah, and Laadah the father of Mareshah, and the families of the house of them that wrought fine linen, of the house of Ashbea,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 22 And Jokim, and the men of Chozeba, and Joash, and Saraph, who had the dominion in Moab, and Jashubilehem. And these are ancient things.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 23 These were the potters, and those that dwelt among plants and hedges: there they dwelt with the king for his work.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 24 The sons of Simeon were, Nemuel, and Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, and Shaul:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 25 Shallum his son, Mibsam his son, Mishma his son.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 26 And the sons of Mishma; Hamuel his son, Zacchur his son, Shimei his son.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 27 And Shimei had sixteen sons and six daughters; but his brethren had not many children, neither did all their family multiply, like to the children of Judah.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 28 And they dwelt at Beersheba, and Moladah, and Hazarshual,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 29 And at Bilhah, and at Ezem, and at Tolad,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 30 And at Bethuel, and at Hormah, and at Ziklag,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 31 And at Bethmarcaboth, and Hazarsusim, and at Bethbirei, and at Shaaraim. These were their cities unto the reign of David.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 32 And their villages were, Etam, and Ain, Rimmon, and Tochen, and Ashan, five cities:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 33 And all their villages that were round about the same cities, unto Baal. These were their habitations, and their genealogy.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 34 And Meshobab, and Jamlech, and Joshah, the son of Amaziah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 35 And Joel, and Jehu the son of Josibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 36 And Elioenai, and Jaakobah, and Jeshohaiah, and Asaiah, and Adiel, and Jesimiel, and Benaiah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 37 And Ziza the son of Shiphi, the son of Allon, the son of Jedaiah, the son of Shimri, the son of Shemaiah;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 38 These mentioned by their names were princes in their families: and the house of their fathers increased greatly.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 39 And they went to the entrance of Gedor, even unto the east side of the valley, to seek pasture for their flocks.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 40 And they found fat pasture and good, and the land was wide, and quiet, and peaceable; for they of Ham had dwelt there of old.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 41 And these written by name came in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah, and smote their tents, and the habitations that were found there, and destroyed them utterly unto this day, and dwelt in their rooms: because there was pasture there for their flocks.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 42 And some of them, even of the sons of Simeon, five hundred men, went to mount Seir, having for their captains Pelatiah, and Neariah, and Rephaiah, and Uzziel, the sons of Ishi.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 4:
Bible.Verse: 43 And they smote the rest of the Amalekites that were escaped, and dwelt there unto this day.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 1 Now the sons of Reuben the firstborn of Israel, (for he was the firstborn; but, forasmuch as he defiled his father's bed, his birthright was given unto the sons of Joseph the son of Israel: and the genealogy is not to be reckoned after the birthright.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 2 For Judah prevailed above his brethren, and of him came the chief ruler; but the birthright was Joseph's:)

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 3 The sons, I say, of Reuben the firstborn of Israel were, Hanoch, and Pallu, Hezron, and Carmi.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 4 The sons of Joel; Shemaiah his son, Gog his son, Shimei his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 5 Micah his son, Reaia his son, Baal his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 6 Beerah his son, whom Tilgathpilneser king of Assyria carried away captive: he was prince of the Reubenites.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 7 And his brethren by their families, when the genealogy of their generations was reckoned, were the chief, Jeiel, and Zechariah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 8 And Bela the son of Azaz, the son of Shema, the son of Joel, who dwelt in Aroer, even unto Nebo and Baalmeon:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 9 And eastward he inhabited unto the entering in of the wilderness from the river Euphrates: because their cattle were multiplied in the land of Gilead.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 10 And in the days of Saul they made war with the Hagarites, who fell by their hand: and they dwelt in their tents throughout all the east land of Gilead.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 11 And the children of Gad dwelt over against them, in the land of Bashan unto Salcah:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 12 Joel the chief, and Shapham the next, and Jaanai, and Shaphat in Bashan.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 13 And their brethren of the house of their fathers were, Michael, and Meshullam, and Sheba, and Jorai, and Jachan, and Zia, and Heber, seven.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 14 These are the children of Abihail the son of Huri, the son of Jaroah, the son of Gilead, the son of Michael, the son of Jeshishai, the son of Jahdo, the son of Buz;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 15 Ahi the son of Abdiel, the son of Guni, chief of the house of their fathers.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 16 And they dwelt in Gilead in Bashan, and in her towns, and in all the suburbs of Sharon, upon their borders.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 17 All these were reckoned by genealogies in the days of Jotham king of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam king of Israel.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 18 The sons of Reuben, and the Gadites, and half the tribe of Manasseh, of valiant men, men able to bear buckler and sword, and to shoot with bow, and skilful in war, were four and forty thousand seven hundred and threescore, that went out to the war.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 19 And they made war with the Hagarites, with Jetur, and Nephish, and Nodab.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 20 And they were helped against them, and the Hagarites were delivered into their hand, and all that were with them: for they cried to God in the battle, and he was intreated of them; because they put their trust in him.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 21 And they took away their cattle; of their camels fifty thousand, and of sheep two hundred and fifty thousand, and of asses two thousand, and of men an hundred thousand.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 22 For there fell down many slain, because the war was of God. And they dwelt in their steads until the captivity.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 23 And the children of the half tribe of Manasseh dwelt in the land: they increased from Bashan unto Baalhermon and Senir, and unto mount Hermon.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 24 And these were the heads of the house of their fathers, even Epher, and Ishi, and Eliel, and Azriel, and Jeremiah, and Hodaviah, and Jahdiel, mighty men of valour, famous men, and heads of the house of their fathers.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 25 And they transgressed against the God of their fathers, and went a whoring after the gods of the people of the land, whom God destroyed before them.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 5:
Bible.Verse: 26 And the God of Israel stirred up the spirit of Pul king of Assyria, and the spirit of Tilgathpilneser king of Assyria, and he carried them away, even the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and the half tribe of Manasseh, and brought them unto Halah, and Habor, and Hara, and to the river Gozan, unto this day.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 1 The sons of Levi; Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 2 And the sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 3 And the children of Amram; Aaron, and Moses, and Miriam. The sons also of Aaron; Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 4 Eleazar begat Phinehas, Phinehas begat Abishua,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 5 And Abishua begat Bukki, and Bukki begat Uzzi,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 6 And Uzzi begat Zerahiah, and Zerahiah begat Meraioth,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 7 Meraioth begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 8 And Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Ahimaaz,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 9 And Ahimaaz begat Azariah, and Azariah begat Johanan,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 10 And Johanan begat Azariah, (he it is that executed the priest's office in the temple that Solomon built in Jerusalem:)

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 11 And Azariah begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 12 And Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Shallum,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 13 And Shallum begat Hilkiah, and Hilkiah begat Azariah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 14 And Azariah begat Seraiah, and Seraiah begat Jehozadak,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 15 And Jehozadak went into captivity, when the LORD carried away Judah and Jerusalem by the hand of Nebuchadnezzar.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 16 The sons of Levi; Gershom, Kohath, and Merari.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 17 And these be the names of the sons of Gershom; Libni, and Shimei.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 18 And the sons of Kohath were, Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 19 The sons of Merari; Mahli, and Mushi. And these are the families of the Levites according to their fathers.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 20 Of Gershom; Libni his son, Jahath his son, Zimmah his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 21 Joah his son, Iddo his son, Zerah his son, Jeaterai his son.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 22 The sons of Kohath; Amminadab his son, Korah his son, Assir his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 23 Elkanah his son, and Ebiasaph his son, and Assir his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 24 Tahath his son, Uriel his son, Uzziah his son, and Shaul his son.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 25 And the sons of Elkanah; Amasai, and Ahimoth.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 26 As for Elkanah: the sons of Elkanah; Zophai his son, and Nahath his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 27 Eliab his son, Jeroham his son, Elkanah his son.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 28 And the sons of Samuel; the firstborn Vashni, and Abiah.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 29 The sons of Merari; Mahli, Libni his son, Shimei his son, Uzza his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 30 Shimea his son, Haggiah his son, Asaiah his son.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 31 And these are they whom David set over the service of song in the house of the LORD, after that the ark had rest.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 32 And they ministered before the dwelling place of the tabernacle of the congregation with singing, until Solomon had built the house of the LORD in Jerusalem: and then they waited on their office according to their order.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 33 And these are they that waited with their children. Of the sons of the Kohathites: Heman a singer, the son of Joel, the son of Shemuel,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 34 The son of Elkanah, the son of Jeroham, the son of Eliel, the son of Toah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 35 The son of Zuph, the son of Elkanah, the son of Mahath, the son of Amasai,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 36 The son of Elkanah, the son of Joel, the son of Azariah, the son of Zephaniah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 37 The son of Tahath, the son of Assir, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 38 The son of Izhar, the son of Kohath, the son of Levi, the son of Israel.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 39 And his brother Asaph, who stood on his right hand, even Asaph the son of Berachiah, the son of Shimea,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 40 The son of Michael, the son of Baaseiah, the son of Malchiah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 41 The son of Ethni, the son of Zerah, the son of Adaiah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 42 The son of Ethan, the son of Zimmah, the son of Shimei,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 43 The son of Jahath, the son of Gershom, the son of Levi.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 44 And their brethren the sons of Merari stood on the left hand: Ethan the son of Kishi, the son of Abdi, the son of Malluch,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 45 The son of Hashabiah, the son of Amaziah, the son of Hilkiah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 46 The son of Amzi, the son of Bani, the son of Shamer,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 47 The son of Mahli, the son of Mushi, the son of Merari, the son of Levi.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 48 Their brethren also the Levites were appointed unto all manner of service of the tabernacle of the house of God.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 49 But Aaron and his sons offered upon the altar of the burnt offering, and on the altar of incense, and were appointed for all the work of the place most holy, and to make an atonement for Israel, according to all that Moses the servant of God had commanded.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 50 And these are the sons of Aaron; Eleazar his son, Phinehas his son, Abishua his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 51 Bukki his son, Uzzi his son, Zerahiah his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 52 Meraioth his son, Amariah his son, Ahitub his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 53 Zadok his son, Ahimaaz his son.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 54 Now these are their dwelling places throughout their castles in their coasts, of the sons of Aaron, of the families of the Kohathites: for theirs was the lot.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 55 And they gave them Hebron in the land of Judah, and the suburbs thereof round about it.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 56 But the fields of the city, and the villages thereof, they gave to Caleb the son of Jephunneh.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 57 And to the sons of Aaron they gave the cities of Judah, namely, Hebron, the city of refuge, and Libnah with her suburbs, and Jattir, and Eshtemoa, with their suburbs,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 58 And Hilen with her suburbs, Debir with her suburbs,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 59 And Ashan with her suburbs, and Bethshemesh with her suburbs:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 60 And out of the tribe of Benjamin; Geba with her suburbs, and Alemeth with her suburbs, and Anathoth with her suburbs. All their cities throughout their families were thirteen cities.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 61 And unto the sons of Kohath, which were left of the family of that tribe, were cities given out of the half tribe, namely, out of the half tribe of Manasseh, by lot, ten cities.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 62 And to the sons of Gershom throughout their families out of the tribe of Issachar, and out of the tribe of Asher, and out of the tribe of Naphtali, and out of the tribe of Manasseh in Bashan, thirteen cities.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 63 Unto the sons of Merari were given by lot, throughout their families, out of the tribe of Reuben, and out of the tribe of Gad, and out of the tribe of Zebulun, twelve cities.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 64 And the children of Israel gave to the Levites these cities with their suburbs.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 65 And they gave by lot out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, and out of the tribe of the children of Benjamin, these cities, which are called by their names.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 66 And the residue of the families of the sons of Kohath had cities of their coasts out of the tribe of Ephraim.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 67 And they gave unto them, of the cities of refuge, Shechem in mount Ephraim with her suburbs; they gave also Gezer with her suburbs,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 68 And Jokmeam with her suburbs, and Bethhoron with her suburbs,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 69 And Aijalon with her suburbs, and Gathrimmon with her suburbs:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 70 And out of the half tribe of Manasseh; Aner with her suburbs, and Bileam with her suburbs, for the family of the remnant of the sons of Kohath.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 71 Unto the sons of Gershom were given out of the family of the half tribe of Manasseh, Golan in Bashan with her suburbs, and Ashtaroth with her suburbs:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 72 And out of the tribe of Issachar; Kedesh with her suburbs, Daberath with her suburbs,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 73 And Ramoth with her suburbs, and Anem with her suburbs:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 74 And out of the tribe of Asher; Mashal with her suburbs, and Abdon with her suburbs,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 75 And Hukok with her suburbs, and Rehob with her suburbs:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 76 And out of the tribe of Naphtali; Kedesh in Galilee with her suburbs, and Hammon with her suburbs, and Kirjathaim with her suburbs.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 77 Unto the rest of the children of Merari were given out of the tribe of Zebulun, Rimmon with her suburbs, Tabor with her suburbs:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 78 And on the other side Jordan by Jericho, on the east side of Jordan, were given them out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer in the wilderness with her suburbs, and Jahzah with her suburbs,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 79 Kedemoth also with her suburbs, and Mephaath with her suburbs:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 80 And out of the tribe of Gad; Ramoth in Gilead with her suburbs, and Mahanaim with her suburbs,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 6:
Bible.Verse: 81 And Heshbon with her suburbs, and Jazer with her suburbs.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 1 Now the sons of Issachar were, Tola, and Puah, Jashub, and Shimrom, four.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 2 And the sons of Tola; Uzzi, and Rephaiah, and Jeriel, and Jahmai, and Jibsam, and Shemuel, heads of their father's house, to wit, of Tola: they were valiant men of might in their generations; whose number was in the days of David two and twenty thousand and six hundred.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 3 And the sons of Uzzi; Izrahiah: and the sons of Izrahiah; Michael, and Obadiah, and Joel, Ishiah, five: all of them chief men.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 4 And with them, by their generations, after the house of their fathers, were bands of soldiers for war, six and thirty thousand men: for they had many wives and sons.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 5 And their brethren among all the families of Issachar were valiant men of might, reckoned in all by their genealogies fourscore and seven thousand.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 6 The sons of Benjamin; Bela, and Becher, and Jediael, three.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 7 And the sons of Bela; Ezbon, and Uzzi, and Uzziel, and Jerimoth, and Iri, five; heads of the house of their fathers, mighty men of valour; and were reckoned by their genealogies twenty and two thousand and thirty and four.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 8 And the sons of Becher; Zemira, and Joash, and Eliezer, and Elioenai, and Omri, and Jerimoth, and Abiah, and Anathoth, and Alameth. All these are the sons of Becher.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 9 And the number of them, after their genealogy by their generations, heads of the house of their fathers, mighty men of valour, was twenty thousand and two hundred.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 10 The sons also of Jediael; Bilhan: and the sons of Bilhan; Jeush, and Benjamin, and Ehud, and Chenaanah, and Zethan, and Tharshish, and Ahishahar.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 11 All these the sons of Jediael, by the heads of their fathers, mighty men of valour, were seventeen thousand and two hundred soldiers, fit to go out for war and battle.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 12 Shuppim also, and Huppim, the children of Ir, and Hushim, the sons of Aher.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 13 The sons of Naphtali; Jahziel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shallum, the sons of Bilhah.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 14 The sons of Manasseh; Ashriel, whom she bare: (but his concubine the Aramitess bare Machir the father of Gilead:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 15 And Machir took to wife the sister of Huppim and Shuppim, whose sister's name was Maachah;) and the name of the second was Zelophehad: and Zelophehad had daughters.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 16 And Maachah the wife of Machir bare a son, and she called his name Peresh; and the name of his brother was Sheresh; and his sons were Ulam and Rakem.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 17 And the sons of Ulam; Bedan. These were the sons of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 18 And his sister Hammoleketh bare Ishod, and Abiezer, and Mahalah.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 19 And the sons of Shemidah were, Ahian, and Shechem, and Likhi, and Aniam.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 20 And the sons of Ephraim; Shuthelah, and Bered his son, and Tahath his son, and Eladah his son, and Tahath his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 21 And Zabad his son, and Shuthelah his son, and Ezer, and Elead, whom the men of Gath that were born in that land slew, because they came down to take away their cattle.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 22 And Ephraim their father mourned many days, and his brethren came to comfort him.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 23 And when he went in to his wife, she conceived, and bare a son, and he called his name Beriah, because it went evil with his house.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 24 (And his daughter was Sherah, who built Bethhoron the nether, and the upper, and Uzzensherah.)

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 25 And Rephah was his son, also Resheph, and Telah his son, and Tahan his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 26 Laadan his son, Ammihud his son, Elishama his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 27 Non his son, Jehoshuah his son,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 28 And their possessions and habitations were, Bethel and the towns thereof, and eastward Naaran, and westward Gezer, with the towns thereof; Shechem also and the towns thereof, unto Gaza and the towns thereof:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 29 And by the borders of the children of Manasseh, Bethshean and her towns, Taanach and her towns, Megiddo and her towns, Dor and her towns. In these dwelt the children of Joseph the son of Israel.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 30 The sons of Asher; Imnah, and Isuah, and Ishuai, and Beriah, and Serah their sister.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 31 And the sons of Beriah; Heber, and Malchiel, who is the father of Birzavith.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 32 And Heber begat Japhlet, and Shomer, and Hotham, and Shua their sister.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 33 And the sons of Japhlet; Pasach, and Bimhal, and Ashvath. These are the children of Japhlet.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 34 And the sons of Shamer; Ahi, and Rohgah, Jehubbah, and Aram.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 35 And the sons of his brother Helem; Zophah, and Imna, and Shelesh, and Amal.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 36 The sons of Zophah; Suah, and Harnepher, and Shual, and Beri, and Imrah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 37 Bezer, and Hod, and Shamma, and Shilshah, and Ithran, and Beera.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 38 And the sons of Jether; Jephunneh, and Pispah, and Ara.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 39 And the sons of Ulla; Arah, and Haniel, and Rezia.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 7:
Bible.Verse: 40 All these were the children of Asher, heads of their father's house, choice and mighty men of valour, chief of the princes. And the number throughout the genealogy of them that were apt to the war and to battle was twenty and six thousand men.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 1 Now Benjamin begat Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 2 Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 3 And the sons of Bela were, Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 4 And Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 5 And Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 6 And these are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Geba, and they removed them to Manahath:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 7 And Naaman, and Ahiah, and Gera, he removed them, and begat Uzza, and Ahihud.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 8 And Shaharaim begat children in the country of Moab, after he had sent them away; Hushim and Baara were his wives.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 9 And he begat of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 10 And Jeuz, and Shachia, and Mirma. These were his sons, heads of the fathers.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 11 And of Hushim he begat Abitub, and Elpaal.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 12 The sons of Elpaal; Eber, and Misham, and Shamed, who built Ono, and Lod, with the towns thereof:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 13 Beriah also, and Shema, who were heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove away the inhabitants of Gath:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 14 And Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 15 And Zebadiah, and Arad, and Ader,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 16 And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 17 And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 18 Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 19 And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 20 And Elienai, and Zilthai, and Eliel,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 21 And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 22 And Ishpan, and Heber, and Eliel,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 23 And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 24 And Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 25 And Iphedeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 26 And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 27 And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 28 These were heads of the fathers, by their generations, chief men. These dwelt in Jerusalem.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 29 And at Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon; whose wife's name was Maachah:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 30 And his firstborn son Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 31 And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zacher.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 32 And Mikloth begat Shimeah. And these also dwelt with their brethren in Jerusalem, over against them.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 33 And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchishua, and Abinadab, and Eshbaal.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 34 And the son of Jonathan was Meribbaal; and Meribbaal begat Micah.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 35 And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 36 And Ahaz begat Jehoadah; and Jehoadah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 37 And Moza begat Binea: Rapha was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 38 And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 39 And the sons of Eshek his brother were, Ulam his firstborn, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 8:
Bible.Verse: 40 And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valour, archers, and had many sons, and sons' sons, an hundred and fifty. All these are of the sons of Benjamin.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 1 So all Israel were reckoned by genealogies; and, behold, they were written in the book of the kings of Israel and Judah, who were carried away to Babylon for their transgression.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 2 Now the first inhabitants that dwelt in their possessions in their cities were, the Israelites, the priests, Levites, and the Nethinims.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 3 And in Jerusalem dwelt of the children of Judah, and of the children of Benjamin, and of the children of Ephraim, and Manasseh;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 4 Uthai the son of Ammihud, the son of Omri, the son of Imri, the son of Bani, of the children of Pharez the son of Judah.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 5 And of the Shilonites; Asaiah the firstborn, and his sons.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 6 And of the sons of Zerah; Jeuel, and their brethren, six hundred and ninety.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 7 And of the sons of Benjamin; Sallu the son of Meshullam, the son of Hodaviah, the son of Hasenuah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 8 And Ibneiah the son of Jeroham, and Elah the son of Uzzi, the son of Michri, and Meshullam the son of Shephathiah, the son of Reuel, the son of Ibnijah;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 9 And their brethren, according to their generations, nine hundred and fifty and six. All these men were chief of the fathers in the house of their fathers.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 10 And of the priests; Jedaiah, and Jehoiarib, and Jachin,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 11 And Azariah the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub, the ruler of the house of God;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 12 And Adaiah the son of Jeroham, the son of Pashur, the son of Malchijah, and Maasiai the son of Adiel, the son of Jahzerah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Meshillemith, the son of Immer;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 13 And their brethren, heads of the house of their fathers, a thousand and seven hundred and threescore; very able men for the work of the service of the house of God.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 14 And of the Levites; Shemaiah the son of Hasshub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, of the sons of Merari;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 15 And Bakbakkar, Heresh, and Galal, and Mattaniah the son of Micah, the son of Zichri, the son of Asaph;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 16 And Obadiah the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun, and Berechiah the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, that dwelt in the villages of the Netophathites.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 17 And the porters were, Shallum, and Akkub, and Talmon, and Ahiman, and their brethren: Shallum was the chief;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 18 Who hitherto waited in the king's gate eastward: they were porters in the companies of the children of Levi.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 19 And Shallum the son of Kore, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah, and his brethren, of the house of his father, the Korahites, were over the work of the service, keepers of the gates of the tabernacle: and their fathers, being over the host of the LORD, were keepers of the entry.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 20 And Phinehas the son of Eleazar was the ruler over them in time past, and the LORD was with him.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 21 And Zechariah the son of Meshelemiah was porter of the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 22 All these which were chosen to be porters in the gates were two hundred and twelve. These were reckoned by their genealogy in their villages, whom David and Samuel the seer did ordain in their set office.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 23 So they and their children had the oversight of the gates of the house of the LORD, namely, the house of the tabernacle, by wards.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 24 In four quarters were the porters, toward the east, west, north, and south.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 25 And their brethren, which were in their villages, were to come after seven days from time to time with them.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 26 For these Levites, the four chief porters, were in their set office, and were over the chambers and treasuries of the house of God.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 27 And they lodged round about the house of God, because the charge was upon them, and the opening thereof every morning pertained to them.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 28 And certain of them had the charge of the ministering vessels, that they should bring them in and out by tale.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 29 Some of them also were appointed to oversee the vessels, and all the instruments of the sanctuary, and the fine flour, and the wine, and the oil, and the frankincense, and the spices.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 30 And some of the sons of the priests made the ointment of the spices.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 31 And Mattithiah, one of the Levites, who was the firstborn of Shallum the Korahite, had the set office over the things that were made in the pans.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 32 And other of their brethren, of the sons of the Kohathites, were over the shewbread, to prepare it every sabbath.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 33 And these are the singers, chief of the fathers of the Levites, who remaining in the chambers were free: for they were employed in that work day and night.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 34 These chief fathers of the Levites were chief throughout their generations; these dwelt at Jerusalem.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 35 And in Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon, Jehiel, whose wife's name was Maachah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 36 And his firstborn son Abdon, then Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Ner, and Nadab,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 37 And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zechariah, and Mikloth.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 38 And Mikloth begat Shimeam. And they also dwelt with their brethren at Jerusalem, over against their brethren.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 39 And Ner begat Kish; and Kish begat Saul; and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchishua, and Abinadab, and Eshbaal.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 40 And the son of Jonathan was Meribbaal: and Meribbaal begat Micah.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 41 And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tahrea, and Ahaz.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 42 And Ahaz begat Jarah; and Jarah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 43 And Moza begat Binea; and Rephaiah his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 9:
Bible.Verse: 44 And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan: these were the sons of Azel.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 10:
Bible.Verse: 1 Now the Philistines fought against Israel; and the men of Israel fled from before the Philistines, and fell down slain in mount Gilboa.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 10:
Bible.Verse: 2 And the Philistines followed hard after Saul, and after his sons; and the Philistines slew Jonathan, and Abinadab, and Malchishua, the sons of Saul.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 10:
Bible.Verse: 3 And the battle went sore against Saul, and the archers hit him, and he was wounded of the archers.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 10:
Bible.Verse: 4 Then said Saul to his armourbearer, Draw thy sword, and thrust me through therewith; lest these uncircumcised come and abuse me. But his armourbearer would not; for he was sore afraid. So Saul took a sword, and fell upon it.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 10:
Bible.Verse: 5 And when his armourbearer saw that Saul was dead, he fell likewise on the sword, and died.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 10:
Bible.Verse: 6 So Saul died, and his three sons, and all his house died together.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 10:
Bible.Verse: 7 And when all the men of Israel that were in the valley saw that they fled, and that Saul and his sons were dead, then they forsook their cities, and fled: and the Philistines came and dwelt in them.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 10:
Bible.Verse: 8 And it came to pass on the morrow, when the Philistines came to strip the slain, that they found Saul and his sons fallen in mount Gilboa.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 10:
Bible.Verse: 9 And when they had stripped him, they took his head, and his armour, and sent into the land of the Philistines round about, to carry tidings unto their idols, and to the people.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 10:
Bible.Verse: 10 And they put his armour in the house of their gods, and fastened his head in the temple of Dagon.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 10:
Bible.Verse: 11 And when all Jabeshgilead heard all that the Philistines had done to Saul,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 10:
Bible.Verse: 12 They arose, all the valiant men, and took away the body of Saul, and the bodies of his sons, and brought them to Jabesh, and buried their bones under the oak in Jabesh, and fasted seven days.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 10:
Bible.Verse: 13 So Saul died for his transgression which he committed against the LORD, even against the word of the LORD, which he kept not, and also for asking counsel of one that had a familiar spirit, to enquire of it;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 10:
Bible.Verse: 14 And enquired not of the LORD: therefore he slew him, and turned the kingdom unto David the son of Jesse.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 1 Then all Israel gathered themselves to David unto Hebron, saying, Behold, we are thy bone and thy flesh.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 2 And moreover in time past, even when Saul was king, thou wast he that leddest out and broughtest in Israel: and the LORD thy God said unto thee, Thou shalt feed my people Israel, and thou shalt be ruler over my people Israel.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 3 Therefore came all the elders of Israel to the king to Hebron; and David made a covenant with them in Hebron before the LORD; and they anointed David king over Israel, according to the word of the LORD by Samuel.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 4 And David and all Israel went to Jerusalem, which is Jebus; where the Jebusites were, the inhabitants of the land.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 5 And the inhabitants of Jebus said to David, Thou shalt not come hither. Nevertheless David took the castle of Zion, which is the city of David.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 6 And David said, Whosoever smiteth the Jebusites first shall be chief and captain. So Joab the son of Zeruiah went first up, and was chief.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 7 And David dwelt in the castle; therefore they called it the city of David.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 8 And he built the city round about, even from Millo round about: and Joab repaired the rest of the city.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 9 So David waxed greater and greater: for the LORD of hosts was with him.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 10 These also are the chief of the mighty men whom David had, who strengthened themselves with him in his kingdom, and with all Israel, to make him king, according to the word of the LORD concerning Israel.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 11 And this is the number of the mighty men whom David had; Jashobeam, an Hachmonite, the chief of the captains: he lifted up his spear against three hundred slain by him at one time.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 12 And after him was Eleazar the son of Dodo, the Ahohite, who was one of the three mighties.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 13 He was with David at Pasdammim, and there the Philistines were gathered together to battle, where was a parcel of ground full of barley; and the people fled from before the Philistines.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 14 And they set themselves in the midst of that parcel, and delivered it, and slew the Philistines; and the LORD saved them by a great deliverance.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 15 Now three of the thirty captains went down to the rock to David, into the cave of Adullam; and the host of the Philistines encamped in the valley of Rephaim.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 16 And David was then in the hold, and the Philistines' garrison was then at Bethlehem.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 17 And David longed, and said, Oh that one would give me drink of the water of the well of Bethlehem, that is at the gate!

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 18 And the three brake through the host of the Philistines, and drew water out of the well of Bethlehem, that was by the gate, and took it, and brought it to David: but David would not drink of it, but poured it out to the LORD,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 19 And said, My God forbid it me, that I should do this thing: shall I drink the blood of these men that have put their lives in jeopardy? for with the jeopardy of their lives they brought it. Therefore he would not drink it. These things did these three mightiest.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 20 And Abishai the brother of Joab, he was chief of the three: for lifting up his spear against three hundred, he slew them, and had a name among the three.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 21 Of the three, he was more honourable than the two; for he was their captain: howbeit he attained not to the first three.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 22 Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, the son of a valiant man of Kabzeel, who had done many acts; he slew two lionlike men of Moab: also he went down and slew a lion in a pit in a snowy day.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 23 And he slew an Egyptian, a man of great stature, five cubits high; and in the Egyptian's hand was a spear like a weaver's beam; and he went down to him with a staff, and plucked the spear out of the Egyptian's hand, and slew him with his own spear.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 24 These things did Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, and had the name among the three mighties.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 25 Behold, he was honourable among the thirty, but attained not to the first three: and David set him over his guard.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 26 Also the valiant men of the armies were, Asahel the brother of Joab, Elhanan the son of Dodo of Bethlehem,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 27 Shammoth the Harorite, Helez the Pelonite,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 28 Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite, Abiezer the Antothite,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 29 Sibbecai the Hushathite, Ilai the Ahohite,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 30 Maharai the Netophathite, Heled the son of Baanah the Netophathite,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 31 Ithai the son of Ribai of Gibeah, that pertained to the children of Benjamin, Benaiah the Pirathonite,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 32 Hurai of the brooks of Gaash, Abiel the Arbathite,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 33 Azmaveth the Baharumite, Eliahba the Shaalbonite,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 34 The sons of Hashem the Gizonite, Jonathan the son of Shage the Hararite,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 35 Ahiam the son of Sacar the Hararite, Eliphal the son of Ur,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 36 Hepher the Mecherathite, Ahijah the Pelonite,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 37 Hezro the Carmelite, Naarai the son of Ezbai,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 38 Joel the brother of Nathan, Mibhar the son of Haggeri,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 39 Zelek the Ammonite, Naharai the Berothite, the armourbearer of Joab the son of Zeruiah,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 40 Ira the Ithrite, Gareb the Ithrite,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 41 Uriah the Hittite, Zabad the son of Ahlai,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 42 Adina the son of Shiza the Reubenite, a captain of the Reubenites, and thirty with him,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 43 Hanan the son of Maachah, and Joshaphat the Mithnite,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 44 Uzzia the Ashterathite, Shama and Jehiel the sons of Hothan the Aroerite,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 45 Jediael the son of Shimri, and Joha his brother, the Tizite,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 46 Eliel the Mahavite, and Jeribai, and Joshaviah, the sons of Elnaam, and Ithmah the Moabite,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 11:
Bible.Verse: 47 Eliel, and Obed, and Jasiel the Mesobaite.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 1 Now these are they that came to David to Ziklag, while he yet kept himself close because of Saul the son of Kish: and they were among the mighty men, helpers of the war.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 2 They were armed with bows, and could use both the right hand and the left in hurling stones and shooting arrows out of a bow, even of Saul's brethren of Benjamin.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 3 The chief was Ahiezer, then Joash, the sons of Shemaah the Gibeathite; and Jeziel, and Pelet, the sons of Azmaveth; and Berachah, and Jehu the Antothite,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 4 And Ismaiah the Gibeonite, a mighty man among the thirty, and over the thirty; and Jeremiah, and Jahaziel, and Johanan, and Josabad the Gederathite,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 5 Eluzai, and Jerimoth, and Bealiah, and Shemariah, and Shephatiah the Haruphite,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 6 Elkanah, and Jesiah, and Azareel, and Joezer, and Jashobeam, the Korhites,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 7 And Joelah, and Zebadiah, the sons of Jeroham of Gedor.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 8 And of the Gadites there separated themselves unto David into the hold to the wilderness men of might, and men of war fit for the battle, that could handle shield and buckler, whose faces were like the faces of lions, and were as swift as the roes upon the mountains;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 9 Ezer the first, Obadiah the second, Eliab the third,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 10 Mishmannah the fourth, Jeremiah the fifth,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 11 Attai the sixth, Eliel the seventh,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 12 Johanan the eighth, Elzabad the ninth,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 13 Jeremiah the tenth, Machbanai the eleventh.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 14 These were of the sons of Gad, captains of the host: one of the least was over an hundred, and the greatest over a thousand.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 15 These are they that went over Jordan in the first month, when it had overflown all his banks; and they put to flight all them of the valleys, both toward the east, and toward the west.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 16 And there came of the children of Benjamin and Judah to the hold unto David.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 17 And David went out to meet them, and answered and said unto them, If ye be come peaceably unto me to help me, mine heart shall be knit unto you: but if ye be come to betray me to mine enemies, seeing there is no wrong in mine hands, the God of our fathers look thereon, and rebuke it.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 18 Then the spirit came upon Amasai, who was chief of the captains, and he said, Thine are we, David, and on thy side, thou son of Jesse: peace, peace be unto thee, and peace be to thine helpers; for thy God helpeth thee. Then David received them, and made them captains of the band.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 19 And there fell some of Manasseh to David, when he came with the Philistines against Saul to battle: but they helped them not: for the lords of the Philistines upon advisement sent him away, saying, He will fall to his master Saul to the jeopardy of our heads.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 20 As he went to Ziklag, there fell to him of Manasseh, Adnah, and Jozabad, and Jediael, and Michael, and Jozabad, and Elihu, and Zilthai, captains of the thousands that were of Manasseh.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 21 And they helped David against the band of the rovers: for they were all mighty men of valour, and were captains in the host.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 22 For at that time day by day there came to David to help him, until it was a great host, like the host of God.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 23 And these are the numbers of the bands that were ready armed to the war, and came to David to Hebron, to turn the kingdom of Saul to him, according to the word of the LORD.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 24 The children of Judah that bare shield and spear were six thousand and eight hundred, ready armed to the war.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 25 Of the children of Simeon, mighty men of valour for the war, seven thousand and one hundred.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 26 Of the children of Levi four thousand and six hundred.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 27 And Jehoiada was the leader of the Aaronites, and with him were three thousand and seven hundred;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 28 And Zadok, a young man mighty of valour, and of his father's house twenty and two captains.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 29 And of the children of Benjamin, the kindred of Saul, three thousand: for hitherto the greatest part of them had kept the ward of the house of Saul.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 30 And of the children of Ephraim twenty thousand and eight hundred, mighty men of valour, famous throughout the house of their fathers.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 31 And of the half tribe of Manasseh eighteen thousand, which were expressed by name, to come and make David king.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 32 And of the children of Issachar, which were men that had understanding of the times, to know what Israel ought to do; the heads of them were two hundred; and all their brethren were at their commandment.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 33 Of Zebulun, such as went forth to battle, expert in war, with all instruments of war, fifty thousand, which could keep rank: they were not of double heart.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 34 And of Naphtali a thousand captains, and with them with shield and spear thirty and seven thousand.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 35 And of the Danites expert in war twenty and eight thousand and six hundred.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 36 And of Asher, such as went forth to battle, expert in war, forty thousand.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 37 And on the other side of Jordan, of the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and of the half tribe of Manasseh, with all manner of instruments of war for the battle, an hundred and twenty thousand.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 38 All these men of war, that could keep rank, came with a perfect heart to Hebron, to make David king over all Israel: and all the rest also of Israel were of one heart to make David king.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 39 And there they were with David three days, eating and drinking: for their brethren had prepared for them.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 12:
Bible.Verse: 40 Moreover they that were nigh them, even unto Issachar and Zebulun and Naphtali, brought bread on asses, and on camels, and on mules, and on oxen, and meat, meal, cakes of figs, and bunches of raisins, and wine, and oil, and oxen, and sheep abundantly: for there was joy in Israel.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 13:
Bible.Verse: 1 And David consulted with the captains of thousands and hundreds, and with every leader.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 13:
Bible.Verse: 2 And David said unto all the congregation of Israel, If it seem good unto you, and that it be of the LORD our God, let us send abroad unto our brethren every where, that are left in all the land of Israel, and with them also to the priests and Levites which are in their cities and suburbs, that they may gather themselves unto us:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 13:
Bible.Verse: 3 And let us bring again the ark of our God to us: for we enquired not at it in the days of Saul.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 13:
Bible.Verse: 4 And all the congregation said that they would do so: for the thing was right in the eyes of all the people.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 13:
Bible.Verse: 5 So David gathered all Israel together, from Shihor of Egypt even unto the entering of Hemath, to bring the ark of God from Kirjathjearim.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 13:
Bible.Verse: 6 And David went up, and all Israel, to Baalah, that is, to Kirjathjearim, which belonged to Judah, to bring up thence the ark of God the LORD, that dwelleth between the cherubims, whose name is called on it.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 13:
Bible.Verse: 7 And they carried the ark of God in a new cart out of the house of Abinadab: and Uzza and Ahio drave the cart.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 13:
Bible.Verse: 8 And David and all Israel played before God with all their might, and with singing, and with harps, and with psalteries, and with timbrels, and with cymbals, and with trumpets.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 13:
Bible.Verse: 9 And when they came unto the threshingfloor of Chidon, Uzza put forth his hand to hold the ark; for the oxen stumbled.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 13:
Bible.Verse: 10 And the anger of the LORD was kindled against Uzza, and he smote him, because he put his hand to the ark: and there he died before God.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 13:
Bible.Verse: 11 And David was displeased, because the LORD had made a breach upon Uzza: wherefore that place is called Perezuzza to this day.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 13:
Bible.Verse: 12 And David was afraid of God that day, saying, How shall I bring the ark of God home to me?

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 13:
Bible.Verse: 13 So David brought not the ark home to himself to the city of David, but carried it aside into the house of Obededom the Gittite.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 13:
Bible.Verse: 14 And the ark of God remained with the family of Obededom in his house three months. And the LORD blessed the house of Obededom, and all that he had.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 14:
Bible.Verse: 1 Now Hiram king of Tyre sent messengers to David, and timber of cedars, with masons and carpenters, to build him an house.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 14:
Bible.Verse: 2 And David perceived that the LORD had confirmed him king over Israel, for his kingdom was lifted up on high, because of his people Israel.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 14:
Bible.Verse: 3 And David took more wives at Jerusalem: and David begat more sons and daughters.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 14:
Bible.Verse: 4 Now these are the names of his children which he had in Jerusalem; Shammua, and Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 14:
Bible.Verse: 5 And Ibhar, and Elishua, and Elpalet,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 14:
Bible.Verse: 6 And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 14:
Bible.Verse: 7 And Elishama, and Beeliada, and Eliphalet.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 14:
Bible.Verse: 8 And when the Philistines heard that David was anointed king over all Israel, all the Philistines went up to seek David. And David heard of it, and went out against them.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 14:
Bible.Verse: 9 And the Philistines came and spread themselves in the valley of Rephaim.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 14:
Bible.Verse: 10 And David enquired of God, saying, Shall I go up against the Philistines? And wilt thou deliver them into mine hand? And the LORD said unto him, Go up; for I will deliver them into thine hand.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 14:
Bible.Verse: 11 So they came up to Baalperazim; and David smote them there. Then David said, God hath broken in upon mine enemies by mine hand like the breaking forth of waters: therefore they called the name of that place Baalperazim.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 14:
Bible.Verse: 12 And when they had left their gods there, David gave a commandment, and they were burned with fire.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 14:
Bible.Verse: 13 And the Philistines yet again spread themselves abroad in the valley.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 14:
Bible.Verse: 14 Therefore David enquired again of God; and God said unto him, Go not up after them; turn away from them, and come upon them over against the mulberry trees.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 14:
Bible.Verse: 15 And it shall be, when thou shalt hear a sound of going in the tops of the mulberry trees, that then thou shalt go out to battle: for God is gone forth before thee to smite the host of the Philistines.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 14:
Bible.Verse: 16 David therefore did as God commanded him: and they smote the host of the Philistines from Gibeon even to Gazer.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 14:
Bible.Verse: 17 And the fame of David went out into all lands; and the LORD brought the fear of him upon all nations.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 1 And David made him houses in the city of David, and prepared a place for the ark of God, and pitched for it a tent.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 2 Then David said, None ought to carry the ark of God but the Levites: for them hath the LORD chosen to carry the ark of God, and to minister unto him for ever.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 3 And David gathered all Israel together to Jerusalem, to bring up the ark of the LORD unto his place, which he had prepared for it.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 4 And David assembled the children of Aaron, and the Levites:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 5 Of the sons of Kohath; Uriel the chief, and his brethren an hundred and twenty:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 6 Of the sons of Merari; Asaiah the chief, and his brethren two hundred and twenty:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 7 Of the sons of Gershom; Joel the chief, and his brethren an hundred and thirty:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 8 Of the sons of Elizaphan; Shemaiah the chief, and his brethren two hundred:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 9 Of the sons of Hebron; Eliel the chief, and his brethren fourscore:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 10 Of the sons of Uzziel; Amminadab the chief, and his brethren an hundred and twelve.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 11 And David called for Zadok and Abiathar the priests, and for the Levites, for Uriel, Asaiah, and Joel, Shemaiah, and Eliel, and Amminadab,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 12 And said unto them, Ye are the chief of the fathers of the Levites: sanctify yourselves, both ye and your brethren, that ye may bring up the ark of the LORD God of Israel unto the place that I have prepared for it.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 13 For because ye did it not at the first, the LORD our God made a breach upon us, for that we sought him not after the due order.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 14 So the priests and the Levites sanctified themselves to bring up the ark of the LORD God of Israel.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 15 And the children of the Levites bare the ark of God upon their shoulders with the staves thereon, as Moses commanded according to the word of the LORD.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 16 And David spake to the chief of the Levites to appoint their brethren to be the singers with instruments of musick, psalteries and harps and cymbals, sounding, by lifting up the voice with joy.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 17 So the Levites appointed Heman the son of Joel; and of his brethren, Asaph the son of Berechiah; and of the sons of Merari their brethren, Ethan the son of Kushaiah;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 18 And with them their brethren of the second degree, Zechariah, Ben, and Jaaziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, Eliab, and Benaiah, and Maaseiah, and Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah, and Obededom, and Jeiel, the porters.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 19 So the singers, Heman, Asaph, and Ethan, were appointed to sound with cymbals of brass;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 20 And Zechariah, and Aziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, and Eliab, and Maaseiah, and Benaiah, with psalteries on Alamoth;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 21 And Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah, and Obededom, and Jeiel, and Azaziah, with harps on the Sheminith to excel.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 22 And Chenaniah, chief of the Levites, was for song: he instructed about the song, because he was skilful.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 23 And Berechiah and Elkanah were doorkeepers for the ark.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 24 And Shebaniah, and Jehoshaphat, and Nethaneel, and Amasai, and Zechariah, and Benaiah, and Eliezer, the priests, did blow with the trumpets before the ark of God: and Obededom and Jehiah were doorkeepers for the ark.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 25 So David, and the elders of Israel, and the captains over thousands, went to bring up the ark of the covenant of the LORD out of the house of Obededom with joy.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 26 And it came to pass, when God helped the Levites that bare the ark of the covenant of the LORD, that they offered seven bullocks and seven rams.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 27 And David was clothed with a robe of fine linen, and all the Levites that bare the ark, and the singers, and Chenaniah the master of the song with the singers: David also had upon him an ephod of linen.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 28 Thus all Israel brought up the ark of the covenant of the LORD with shouting, and with sound of the cornet, and with trumpets, and with cymbals, making a noise with psalteries and harps.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 15:
Bible.Verse: 29 And it came to pass, as the ark of the covenant of the LORD came to the city of David, that Michal, the daughter of Saul looking out at a window saw king David dancing and playing: and she despised him in her heart.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 1 So they brought the ark of God, and set it in the midst of the tent that David had pitched for it: and they offered burnt sacrifices and peace offerings before God.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 2 And when David had made an end of offering the burnt offerings and the peace offerings, he blessed the people in the name of the LORD.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 3 And he dealt to every one of Israel, both man and woman, to every one a loaf of bread, and a good piece of flesh, and a flagon of wine.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 4 And he appointed certain of the Levites to minister before the ark of the LORD, and to record, and to thank and praise the LORD God of Israel:

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 5 Asaph the chief, and next to him Zechariah, Jeiel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Mattithiah, and Eliab, and Benaiah, and Obededom: and Jeiel with psalteries and with harps; but Asaph made a sound with cymbals;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 6 Benaiah also and Jahaziel the priests with trumpets continually before the ark of the covenant of God.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 7 Then on that day David delivered first this psalm to thank the LORD into the hand of Asaph and his brethren.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 8 Give thanks unto the LORD, call upon his name, make known his deeds among the people.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 9 Sing unto him, sing psalms unto him, talk ye of all his wondrous works.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 10 Glory ye in his holy name: let the heart of them rejoice that seek the LORD.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 11 Seek the LORD and his strength, seek his face continually.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 12 Remember his marvellous works that he hath done, his wonders, and the judgments of his mouth;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 13 O ye seed of Israel his servant, ye children of Jacob, his chosen ones.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 14 He is the LORD our God; his judgments are in all the earth.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 15 Be ye mindful always of his covenant; the word which he commanded to a thousand generations;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 16 Even of the covenant which he made with Abraham, and of his oath unto Isaac;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 17 And hath confirmed the same to Jacob for a law, and to Israel for an everlasting covenant,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 18 Saying, Unto thee will I give the land of Canaan, the lot of your inheritance;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 19 When ye were but few, even a few, and strangers in it.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 20 And when they went from nation to nation, and from one kingdom to another people;

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 21 He suffered no man to do them wrong: yea, he reproved kings for their sakes,

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 22 Saying, Touch not mine anointed, and do my prophets no harm.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 23 Sing unto the LORD, all the earth; shew forth from day to day his salvation.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 24 Declare his glory among the heathen; his marvellous works among all nations.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 25 For great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised: he also is to be feared above all gods.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 26 For all the gods of the people are idols: but the LORD made the heavens.

Bible.Title: 1 Chronicles 16:
Bible.Verse: 27 Glory and honour are in his presence; strength and gladness are in his place.
